install.name: SOBI2 Top Rated Module
install.author: Sigrid and Radek Suski, Sigsiu.NET
install.description: SOBI2 Top Rated Module. This modules shows the top rated entries of SOBI2 in a module position. The SOBI2 Reviews and Ratings Plugin has to be installed in order to use this module.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the module, this allows individual module styling.

param.name: direction
param.label: Item Style
param.description: Style of the items in the module. If 'DIV Container' is selected, the items are within separate DIV containers. Use this to show the module horizontally. Style the container view by adding the CSS class 'sobi2toprated' to your template CSS file. If 'List' is selected the items are in list view.

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: Number of items to display (default 5, min. 1).

param.name: item_length
param.label: Title Length
param.description: Max. length of the title. If the title is longer, it will be shortened and three dots are added. Enter '0' for unlimited title length.

param.name: categorydepend
param.label: Category Dependant
param.description: If in category view, show only the items of that category.

param.name: showNoEntries
param.label: Empty Text
param.description: Text to be shown if no entries are shown in the module. You can insert HTML code here.

param.name: showlimit
param.label: Top List Limit
param.description: Minimum number of votes to get in the top list (default 15).

param.name: showvotes
param.label: Show Vote Average
param.description: Show the vote average next to the title in brackets.

param.name: showvotesimage
param.label: Show Vote Image
param.description: Show the vote image (e.g. the stars) next to the title.

param.name: catsignore
param.label: Ignore Categories
param.description: To ignore entries from specific categories, enter comma-separated all ids of these categories.
